content.description:
We know that a dream can be real, but who ever thought that reality could be a dream? .....  Think about it and then ask yourself, do you live here, in this country, in this world, or do you live instead in the Twilight Zone?

Begin by climbing a blunt arête or a shallow dihedral and pass the bottom roof on the right.  Move up the ramp for 10 feet then angle up and left towards the crack located in the center of the top roof.  Keep moving and keep dreaming about those huge jugs waiting for you just over the roof.
content.protection: 11 bolts to a top anchor of two cold shuts.
content.location: Shadow Play ascends the right margin of the brown, clean face and passes through two roofs.  It is located on the north facing wall approximately 30 feet to the right of the where the north and west facing walls meet.

content.protection: 12 bolts and some change for the 2 bolt anchor. Use long slings on the 8th and 9th bolts to minimize drag.
content.location:
First route on the leftmost roof system. Just left of

Freedom Fries

.

climbs.name: Freedom Fries
climbs.fa: Bruno Haché, Kirk Miller, Eric Schmeer (9/08)

content.description: Chase two bolts up into the corner and pull through the roofs into the dihedral.  Climb on up and exit the dihedral right to pull the upper headwall.
content.location: This route ascends the left side of the red wall.

content.protection: 10 bolts to ring and chain anchor.
content.location:
Execution is left of

The Chaser

.

content.protection: 9 bolts to chain and ring anchor.
content.location: This is currently the rightmost route in The Twilight Zone.
